Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey-black in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of a Coptic cross in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394418) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394418)
